ACADAutoNameInfo: Enables auto-naming while saving drawing files in 3DEXPERIENCE for the first time. It applies to all applications authoring AutoCAD data.
ACADReplaceTitleByNewNameOnAutonameLabel: Replace Title By New Name On Autoname
ACADReplaceTitleByNewNameOnAutonameInfo: On selection of autoname on save dialog, the existing filename will be replaced by the autoname.
ACADEnablePessimisticLockingInfo: Enabling this feature ensures that data cannot be saved to the platform from the connector unless it is reserved by the current user.
ACADFileReadOnlyInfo: File will be marked as read-only if it is not reserved by current user. This behavior will be enabled only if pessimistic locking is enabled.
ACADDelimiterInfo:
This delimiter will be used as follows:
1. To merge values of multi-valued attributes in 3DEXPERIENCE when synchronizing on CAD file.
2. To split CAD attribute value if it is mapped to multi-valued attribute in 3DEXPERIENCE.
InvalidDelimiter: More than one character is not allowed as a delimiter
